description: Naama Issachar was arrested in Moscow after nine grams of marijuana was found in her luggage.
title: Naama Issachar: US-Israeli woman released from Russian prison
title_page: Naama Issachar: US-Israeli woman released from Russian prison - BBC News
maintext: Naama Issachar, 26, was arrested in Moscow in April 2019 after more than nine grams of marijuana were found in her luggage. She was later sentenced to more than seven years in prison.
